Large Synoptic Survey Telescope (LSST)¶

  • Opening a Window of Discovery on the Dynamic Universe

    • Information for scientists

    • LSSTC is a not-for-profit 501(c)3 corporation formed to initiate the LSST Project and advance the science of astronomy and physics.

LSST Dark Matter¶

  • LSST Dark Matter - Probing the fundamental physics of dark matter with LSST

    • Dark Matter Graphics - This graphic is intended to help conceptually organize the LSST dark matter program and to serve as a road map for future scientific investigations.

LSST Dark Energy Science Collaboration¶

  • LSST Dark Energy Science Collaboration

    • LSST DESC is the large international collaboration that will make high accuracy measurements of fundamental cosmological parameters using data from the Large Synoptic Survey Telescope

    • LSST DESC Science Roadmap

    • LSST Dark Energy School

Important Components:¶

  • afw: LSST data management: pipeline library code and primitives including images and tables

  • lsst-build: a builder and continuous integration tool for LSST

  • pipe_base: LSST Data Management: base classes for data processing tasks

  • pipe_tasks: LSST Data Management: astronomical data processing tasks

  • pipe_drivers: LSST Data Management: high level task coordination scripts

  • daf_butler: Prototype for data access framework described in DMTN-056

  • daf_persistence: Data access interface (the Butler) and deprecated persistence framework for LSST Data Management

  • daf_base: Low-level data structures, including memory-management helpers (Citizen), mappings (PropertySet, PropertyList), and DateTime

  • skymap: Sky pixelization interfaces and implementations used by LSST Data Management

  • jointcal: Simultaneous astrometry and photometry

  • meas_mosaic: determine consistent astrometry and photometry for multiple images

  • meas_modelfit: LSST Data Management: model fitting algorithms

  • meas_extentions_shapeHSM: LSST Data Management: HSM shape measurement

  • meas_extensions_psfex: LSST Data Management: PSF Estimation

  • meas_base: LSST Data Management: core astronomical measurement algorithms

  • meas_algorithms: LSST Data Management: astronomical measurement algorithm

  • meas_deblender: LSST Data Management: astronomical source deblender

  • meas_astrom: LSST Data Management: astrometric measurement algorithms

  • ip_isr: LSST data management: instrument signature removal (detrending) for astronomical images

  • ip_diffim: LSST data management: astronomical image differencing

  • geom: Low-level geometry primitives for LSST Data Management

  • coadd_utils: LSST data management: base classes for coadding (stacking) astronomical images

  • throughputs: LSST Simulations repository for baseline evaluation information

Simulation Related:¶

  • imSim: GalSim based Large Synoptic Survey Telescope (LSST) image simulation package

    • It produces simulated images from the 3.25 Gigapixel camera which are suitable to be processed through the LSST Data Management pipeline.

  • phoSim: Photon Simulator

    • A set of extremely fast photon Monte Carlo codes used to calculate the physics of the atmosphere and a telescope & camera in order to simulate realistic optical/IR astronomical images.

  • sims_utils: LSST Simulations package for simulation utility functions

  • sims_photUtils: LSST Simulations package for photometric utility functions

  • sims_survey_fields: A package for retrieving LSST survey fields

  • sims_skybrightness: Tool to predict the background sky emission SED at an arbitrary RA, Dec, and MJD
